::Killfest::

Killfest frowns. "I'm not really sure. Barging in there with guns blazing is going to get us all killed, though."

He frowns, deep in thought. "Bots like us arn't designed to operate under water, but with special suits and things like that, we can be able to. However, it might still slow us down.

"What I think we should do," he continues, "Is first scout the base out to see if it has any weaknesses. Scyther has technology that can be used to do that. Once we have a scan, we can coordinate our attack accordingly. I think attacking only specific sectors is the better idea, but we need to know what sectors are the important ones."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Shivah::
> 
> Shivah looked to Killfest "what's your plan commander Killfest?"
